entries.message:
Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Los Angeles location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2023-05-04 11:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2023-05-04 13:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to reduce impact to customer infrastructure. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact, however, network reachability to Los Angeles instances may be affected for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform this work. While it’s important to be aware of start and end times of the maintenance window, due to our redundant network architecture, our engineers expect that you may see little to no impact at all while the work is performed.

service_alerts.subject: (STAFF NOTICE) Osaka itm-image01 Image Cluster Hardware Move

entries.message:
The Ceph image cluster in Osaka was deployed in one cab initially due to space constraints in the data center.

Our normal protocol is to deploy Ceph into 3x cabs so that if a rack were to fail, then it is less likely to take down the entire cluster. 

B612 is scheduled to begin work on Wednesday May 3rd.

No customer impact is expected.

New Jersey Object Storage continues to have reduced performance and some availability issues.   We have temporarily stabilized the situation to a reasonable degree, but note that further work here is known to be required.  The next major intervention for the NJ object product is planned for Monday, April 24th (EST) .

Thank you for your patience and understanding during this troubleshooting and recovery process.

Event Type: Service Degraded Performance and Availability

Our Cloud Storage team is investigating a partial outage situation with our Object Storage infrastructure. The following services may be impacted by this event:

- Object Storage Subscription management
- Adding or removing buckets
- S3 client issues

We are working quickly to restore service to its optimal state.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the New Jersey location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2023-05-04 04:00:00 UTC  (00:00 local time)
End Time: 2023-05-04 06:00:00 UTC  (02:00 local time)

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, New Jersey instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

Event Type: Service Degraded Performance and Availability

Our Cloud Storage team is investigating a partial outage situation with our Object Storage infrastructure. The following services may be impacted by this event:

- Object Storage Subscription management
- Adding or removing buckets
- S3 client issues
- HTTP 502 and 504 errors

Our engineers are in the process of adding additional resources to improve service stability and performance.
